package mypack;

		//System.out.println(args[1]);
		
		Scanner scan = new Scanner(System.in);
		
		//System.out.print("Please Enter the Value =   ");
		//int intData =scan.nextInt();
		
		//float f1 = scan.nextFloat();
		
		//char ch =scan.next().charAt(3);
			
		//System.out.println("Your ist Enter Value is "+ch);
		
		//String st = scan.next();
		
		//System.out.println("Your ist Enter Value is "+st);
				
		System.out.print("Please Enter the ist Value =   ");
		int num1 =scan.nextInt();
		
		System.out.print("Please Enter the 2nd Value =   ");
		int num2 =scan.nextInt();
		
		System.out.println("Your add enter Value is , Sum = "+(num1+num2);	
								
	}
	

}
